scripts.dev: concurrently "parcel watch scripts/index.js --out-dir ../assets --out-file bundle.min.js" "parcel watch styles/index.scss --out-dir ../assets --out-file style.min.css" "cd .. && theme watch"
scripts.build: parcel build scripts/index.js --out-dir ../assets --out-file bundle.min.js --no-source-maps && parcel build styles/index.scss --out-dir ../assets --out-file style.min.css --no-source-maps
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -rf /.cache && rm -rf ../.cache && rm -rf ../assets/bundle.min.map && rm -rf ../assets/style.min.js && rm -rf ../assets/style.min.map
scripts.deploy: yarn && yarn build && yarn clean && cd .. && theme deploy
